creditline: Museum purchase, Mary Trumbull Adams Art Fund

texts.textentryhtml: Bastian collection; Völkerkunde Museum, Berlin, Germany, by 1878; Charles Ratton, Paris, France; Josef Mueller, Soleure, Switzerland, by 1953; Jean Paul Barbier, Geneva, Switzerland, by 1977. Museu Barbier-Mueller d’Art Precolombí, Barcelona, Spain, 1977-2013; purchased by the Princeton University Art Museum, 2012.
